item.title: els provides the spur to schwartzel success

item.description: world number one rafa nadal cruised into the barcelona open quarter-finals with a 6-3 6-1 victory over unseeded colombian santiago giraldo on thursday.

item.title: goldman cuts intel to sell, says glut looms
